page.title: 02THE MULBERRY CENTRE,DORKING
page.content: The Mulberry Centre in Junction Road is open all year round.It is a youth centre that during the holidays provides sports and entertainment inculding discos.It can also be hired privately. During the Summer it has a play scheme which organises games and outings for the club members. There are often coffee mornings and jumble sales to raise money for charity. It also gives dinners to local old people. To reach the Mulberry Centre,go along The High Street and take the left hand road,South Street.Then the right hand turning after Waitrose.There are good parking facillities.
